name: docpad-plugin-moment
description: Adds support for date formatting with Moment.js
readme: # DocPad Moment Plugin Use the Moment module to format specified dates. ## Getting Started ``` npm install --save docpad-plugin-moment ``` Configure some formats in your `docpad.coffee`: ```coffee plugins: moment: formats: [ {raw: 'date', format: 'MMMM Do YYYY', formatted: 'humanDate'} {raw: 'date', format: 'YYYY-MM-DD', formatted: 'computerDate'} ] ``` * raw = the name of the existing attribute in your content * format = the format you want it changed to * formatted = a name for the new version Then, in your template, instead of: ```eco Posted on <%- @date %> ``` You would do: ```eco Posted on <%- @humanDate %> ``` ## Future * Provide a generic templateHelper for on-the-fly formatting * Maybe incorporate some of the other functionality of Moment.js?
